item.title: MIUI OS1.0.23.0.ULIMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12 Lite Global

Codename: taoyao

Version: OS1.0.23.0.ULIMIXM | 14.0

MD5: 7f77052e5fd44616911a51314c1b8bbb

[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to July 2025. Increased system security.
